Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory309.png'}
{3: 'Looking at how the residents thank them ceaselessly, Vera genuinely considers changing their name to Cerberus Volunteers.'}
{3: 'Although Vera has already asked No. 21 to secretly remove the broken parts in their trunk that drew the Corrupted in the last battle...'}

{3: "Many buildings and facilities have been unnecessarily obliterated by Noctis' mindless bombings during the fight. Before Vera could clean up his mess, however, the townsfolk already jumped to excuse themâ€”"}
{3: '"You saved our lives. These damages are nothing."'}
{3: 'But Vera cannot help but feel embarrassed for a while, knowing that they have received so many praises even though this stroke of misfortune was caused by no other but themselves.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Leaving already?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'We still have a job to do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "That's fair. You're... heading northwest?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Northwest, along Route 77.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Sounds good. Let's stick together.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Beardy inspects his gear before jumping on his motorcycle.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You managed to get your bike fixed?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Both this bike and I have been broken before.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I can't say for sure if your destination is on our way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "It's in the same general direction. It's all on this road, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Just so you know.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't need to explain the possible dangers that lie ahead. You know full well yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We have a mission of our own. Cerberus won't slow down or stop for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Certainly, certainly.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Let's get going.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Sit in the front, No. 21.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Get in the car. Mount your bike to the back.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll consider it an extra bottle of gas.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Thank you, then.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh, right. One more thing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You got insurance? Life insurance that pays for car accidents?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{3: "Route 77 seems to have no end. It will continue to stretch on even when it reaches the vision's limit."}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'It still doesn\'t sound right! There can\'t be "war-ending relics" out there!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah. Those are a little bit too naive indeed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Isn't it better if they exist?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'That was the thought the young man held on to when he departed. And the first challenge he faced was the haunted forest.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What... was the forest like?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Strange vines grew all over the place, and monsters that bore no resemblance to humans dwelled.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Those monsters would change their appearances based on who entered the forest. They would become what the person hated and feared the most.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Those weaknesses and fears were all reflections of the human heart.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Hm... Why are all forests like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Did no one go through the forest with him?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Not that I remember.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'In that forest, however, he saw many corpses... and ghosts of those who tried to get the relics and became knights.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Everyone died in the way they feared the most. Some got eaten by spiders, some were strangled by vines, and some were staked through their chests...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What a lousy B-movie.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Yeah. That's what I thought.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What kind of knight are you if you can't even beat what you despise the most?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'So, only the main character survived.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What happened next?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'No monsters could stop him after days of fighting, and he walked out of the forest despite all his wounds.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is there really someone that stupid?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'In the movies, I suppose.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That was the director's wishful thinking. All movies from the Golden Age were shit, if you ask me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Which era is free from shit movies? How would we know what's good otherwise?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Dammit! That's unacceptable!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Why did everyone want to save the world back then? Did everyone want to be a superhero?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Is it bad... to save the world?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "But it's so hard just to think about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "After all... it's not that the audience wanted to be heroes. They just needed a hero they could look forward to saving them.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'See? It immediately becomes more crass.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I'd rather go for something more grounded. Look at us now. It's hard enough just to survive!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "That's why they needed a hero to save them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Yeah! Tch... Dammit. Did I mix it up?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Wait. Let me fix it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21, who has been sitting in the front, chuckles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You should quit film criticism with that level of astuteness.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: "That's okay. Not all critics were professional during the Golden Age.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'I even heard some critics only said three lines in their reviews all their lives.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Which three lines?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "I would've been a critic if I knew, wouldn't I?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "That said, I don't think critiquing a movie is any less difficult than making one.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "They're movies! Even I can make them! Find me if you're making one next time. It'll be so much better than this crappy B-movie.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What happened next? What happened next?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Well, the young man went through the forest and found a tower covered in smoke and dark clouds...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'And the dust storm rolls in.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png', 3: '0.3', 4: '0.3', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You're not... sick, are you, Vera?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Give me a break. Constructs don't get sick.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You better shut up, too. It's a pain to clean the sand that got into your vocal module.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 suddenly drops her raised hands, and sand pours out of her big sleeves.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Cough... 21... Cough... cough...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before Noctis can scold No. 21 for getting sand on him, his vocal module is already choking with sand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: "This sandstorm... We can't keep hiding behind the car. Let's find a shelter from the storm.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Tch... We can't see everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'A map. Do you have a map?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "No. 21 stuffs an old map into Beardy's hands."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I picked it up from the garage owner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Huh? I suppose his death wasn't in vain... Let me see...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "If we've driven for four hours... there should be a ravine in our south. We can hide there for a while.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Do you know when the sandstorm will stop?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beardy shakes his head, tightening the rag he is using as a mask to cover his face.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Could be a few hours, could be a whole day. Can't say for sure.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's go, then. To the place you were talking about.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Should we take the car off the road first? In case someone drove it away?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: "No one's out here in this weather, but it's a good idea to take it off the road. We don't want some blind driver crashing into it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll drive it to the side.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera stands up and tries to shake the sand off her body, but she immediately gives up once she pulls the car door open.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory333.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'See? See? I told you I should drive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Now our door is gone, and our windshield is shattered. How do we see the road now?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera pulls Noctis away before striking the smashed windshield right in the center, knocking the whole piece of glass off.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Can you see the road now?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.7', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Come and help me, No. 21. Get rid of the sand in the car.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Where's the ravine again? Get ready to go.", 4: '1'}
